events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match what I ordered at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request because the customer received the wrong product and wants their money back.
Support agent Jane has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product received by the customer.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I’m very sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this sorted out quickly for you.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so that I can verify the details and process your refund?
Thank you for the quick response. I have attached the photo of the package and the wrong item received, along with my order number in this message.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method and arrange a free return label for you to send the wrong item back.
I appreciate the prompt solution and the offer of a free return label. This helps a lot, thank you for your assistance!
The refund has now been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please check your inbox, and feel free to reach out if you need further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and the return label, and to see if everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
The case has been closed following confirmation that the refund was received and the customer has no further issues. Thank you for contacting support.
